FuncDef: The acl ipv6 name command creates an advanced ACL6 and displays the ACL6 view. If the advanced ACL6 to be created already exists, running this command directly displays the ACL6 view. The acl ipv6 name command creates an advanced ACL6 and displays the ACL6 view. If the advanced ACL6 to be created already exists, running this command directly displays the ACL6 view. By default, no advanced ACL6 is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Creates an advanced ACL6 with a name.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: Advanced ACL6s match packets based on the source IP address, destination IP address, IP protocol type, and protocol-specific configurations (for example, source and destination TCP ports and ICMPv6 protocol type and code) of the packets. To create an advanced ACL6, run the acl ipv6 command.
